name: ERC721
description: ERC721 Non-Fungible Token Standard basic implementation. see https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-721.

functionDecorators.name: approve
functionDecorators.description: Approves another address to transfer the given token ID The zero address indicates there is no approved address. There can only be one approved address per token at a given time. Can only be called by the token owner or an approved operator.

parameterDecorators.name: to
parameterDecorators.description: address to be approved for the given token ID.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenId
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 ID of the token to be approved.

functionDecorators.name: balanceOf
functionDecorators.description: Gets the balance of the specified address.

parameterDecorators.name: owner
parameterDecorators.description: address to query the balance of.

returnDecorators.description: uint256 representing the amount owned by the passed address.

functionDecorators.name: baseURI
functionDecorators.description: Returns the base URI set via {_setBaseURI}. This will be automatically added as a prefix in {tokenURI} to each token's URI, or to the token ID if no specific URI is set for that token ID.

functionDecorators.name: getApproved
functionDecorators.description: Gets the approved address for a token ID, or zero if no address set Reverts if the token ID does not exist.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenId
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 ID of the token to query the approval of.

returnDecorators.description: address currently approved for the given token ID.

functionDecorators.name: isApprovedForAll
functionDecorators.description: Tells whether an operator is approved by a given owner.

parameterDecorators.name: owner
parameterDecorators.description: owner address which you want to query the approval of.

parameterDecorators.name: operator
parameterDecorators.description: operator address which you want to query the approval of.

returnDecorators.description: bool whether the given operator is approved by the given owner.

functionDecorators.name: ownerOf
functionDecorators.description: Gets the owner of the specified token ID.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenId
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 ID of the token to query the owner of.

returnDecorators.description: address currently marked as the owner of the given token ID.

functionDecorators.name: setApprovalForAll
functionDecorators.description: Sets or unsets the approval of a given operator An operator is allowed to transfer all tokens of the sender on their behalf.

parameterDecorators.name: operator
parameterDecorators.description: operator address to set the approval.

parameterDecorators.name: approved
parameterDecorators.description: representing the status of the approval to be set.

functionDecorators.name: setup
functionDecorators.description: Safely transfers `tokenId` token from `from` to `to`. Requirements: - `from`, `to` cannot be zero. - `tokenId` token must exist and be owned by `from`. - If the caller is not `from`, it must be approved to move this token by either {approve} or {setApprovalForAll}. - If `to` refers to a smart contract, it must implement {IERC721Receiver-onERC721Received}, which is called upon a safe transfer. Emits a {Transfer} event.

functionDecorators.name: supportsInterface
functionDecorators.description: See {IERC165-supportsInterface}. Time complexity O(1), guaranteed to always use less than 30 000 gas.

functionDecorators.name: tokenByIndex
functionDecorators.description: Gets the token ID at a given index of all the tokens in this contract Reverts if the index is greater or equal to the total number of tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: index
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 representing the index to be accessed of the tokens list.

returnDecorators.description: uint256 token ID at the given index of the tokens list.

functionDecorators.name: tokenOfOwnerByIndex
functionDecorators.description: Gets the token ID at a given index of the tokens list of the requested owner.

parameterDecorators.name: owner
parameterDecorators.description: address owning the tokens list to be accessed.

parameterDecorators.name: index
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 representing the index to be accessed of the requested tokens list.

returnDecorators.description: uint256 token ID at the given index of the tokens list owned by the requested address.

functionDecorators.name: tokenURI
functionDecorators.description: Returns the URI for a given token ID. May return an empty string. If a base URI is set (via {_setBaseURI}), it is added as a prefix to the token's own URI (via {_setTokenURI}). If there is a base URI but no token URI, the token's ID will be used as its URI when appending it to the base URI. This pattern for autogenerated token URIs can lead to large gas savings. .Examples |=== |`_setBaseURI()` |`_setTokenURI()` |`tokenURI()` | "" | "" | "" | "" | "token.uri/123" | "token.uri/123" | "token.uri/" | "123" | "token.uri/123" | "token.uri/" | "" | "token.uri/<tokenId>" |=== Requirements: - `tokenId` must exist.

functionDecorators.name: totalSupply
functionDecorators.description: Gets the total amount of tokens stored by the contract.

returnDecorators.description: uint256 representing the total amount of tokens.

functionDecorators.name: transferFrom
functionDecorators.description: Transfers the ownership of a given token ID to another address. Usage of this method is discouraged, use {safeTransferFrom} whenever possible. Requires the msg.sender to be the owner, approved, or operator.

parameterDecorators.name: to
parameterDecorators.description: address to receive the ownership of the given token ID.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenId
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 ID of the token to be transferred.
